Text:
Excellent film, many thanks.

However - be warned that there are no subtitles.
Menu item is there, but the track is missing.
Someone has saved a few megabytes. :-S

Wow...to upload this beautiful piece of work, lovingly seed it over time...and then to leave out the subtitles used by majority of the international audience in what HAD to be an intentional deletion during the rip.  Wow.  Thanks anyhow.

Indeed beautifully done but to leave out subtitles is peculiar. I love this opera. I want the choice to view with STs and once I understand it, without.
Namatem qu3110
